snippet: Why are liberals surrendering on affirmative action?
abstract: Op-Ed article by Sherrilyn A Ifill, president and director-counsel of  NAACP Legal Defense and Education Fund Inc, questions why liberals seem to be surrendering on affirmative action in college admissions; contends no matter what Supreme Court decides on issue, battle for racial diversity in higher education will not end, as legitimacy of democracy depends on ensuring that doors of opportunity are open to all.
lead_paragraph: Why are liberals surrendering on affirmative action?

headline.main: Race vs. Class: The False Dichotomy
headline.print_headline: Race vs. Class: The False Dichotomy
